cab.content: This docnment is the property of His Britannic Majestys Government,WAE CABINET.THE DANGER TO ARMENIA.I circulate a telegram which I have received from the Armenian United Association of London.WINSTON S. CHURCHILL.Ibth August, 1919. .Armenian communities in British Empire horror-stricken at proposed withdrawal of British troops from Armenia and inevitable sequel annihilation of remnants of loyal and martyred Allied "race. Most urgently and desperately appeal to His Majesty's Government not to relentlessly abandon these imperilled people to this tragic and undeserved fate, and to generously prolong British occupation until such time as troops may be adequately relieved by mandatory power. Joakin, Vice-President; Stephens, Hon. Treasurer; Yeitzian, Hon. Secretary, Armenian United Association of London.(B19/374) 70 8/19 H&S 7415wo
